tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lawmakers ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(255), 
    party VARCHAR(50), 
    state VARCHAR(50), 
    district INT 
 );

CREATE TABLE bills ( 
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    title VARCHAR(255), 
    description TEXT, 
    vote_result VARCHAR(50), 
    voter_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES lawmakers(id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lawmaker_id INT,
    bill_id INT,
    vote_result VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    vote_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lawmaker_id INT NOT NULL,
    bill_id INT NOT NULL,
    vote VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    vote_date DATE
);
